Actions.Name: Lob
Actions.Effects: Ignores cover. One or two different foes in range 4 from the target foe also take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Flash
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is vulnerable. Vulnerable foes take 2 piercing damage and become burning.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark an unoccupied space in range 8.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 2 piercing damage twice, and ending this effect.
